name: Ringer (DanielConway)
description:
Ringer is a fighting game about a rigged match... and you're the one that has to lose.

To keep the lights on back home you sign a contract saying you'll throw the fight, just make sure you put on a good show before you do it. 

Learn your enemy's moves to put on the show as planned, but don't let him get the best of you too early and don't overdo it yourself!

Controls:

Controller Play is Heavily Recommended

Keyboard Controls:

A-D to move right and left
Space to jump
Left click to punch
Right click to kick
Shift to block
